titleStmt.title: A discourse of monarchy more particularly of the imperial crowns of England, Scotland, and Ireland according to the ancient, common, and statute-laws of the same : with a close from the whole as it relates to the succession of His Royal Highness James Duke of York.
titleStmt.author: Wilson, John, 1626-1696.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M.C. for Jos. Hindmarsh,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
